mapper.select: SELECT twea.id, twea.org_id, twea.welding_type, twea.project_code, twea.application_reason, twea.status, twea.review_comment, twea.submitted_at, twea.reviewed_at, org.name AS org_name FROM ted_welding_exam_application twea JOIN ted_org org ON twea.org_id = org.id AND org.is_deleted = 0 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
